mapper.select: select C.idx, U.idx as users_idx, U.nick_name, U.user_img from chat_room C join ( select idx, nick_name, user_img from users where ( idx in (select participant1_idx from chat_room where participant1_idx=#{idx} or participant2_idx=#{idx}) or idx in (select participant2_idx from chat_room where participant1_idx=#{idx} or participant2_idx=#{idx}) ) and idx != #{idx} ) U on C.participant1_idx = U.idx or C.participant2_idx = U.idx where C.participant1_idx=#{idx} or C.participant2_idx=#{idx}
select C.*, U.nick_name, U.user_img from chat C join users U on C.writer_idx=U.idx where room_idx=#{room_idx} order by C.idx
